Class TestMessaging

extends java.lang.Object
    Test class to test messaging functionality

    • Constructor Detail

      • TestMessaging

        public TestMessaging()
        Constructs a testMessaging object that will be used for testing. Initialises and populates messageList with sample Message objects.

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Calls testAll() to run all tests in class

      • testAll

        public static void testAll()
        Creates a new TestMessaging object and calls all test methods in class.

      • sortArrayMessages

        public void sortArrayMessages()
        Tests message sorting on a primitive array of messages. Prints list of unsorted messages, sorts them, and prints sorted list.

      • sortArrayListMessages

        public void sortArrayListMessages()
        Tests message sorting on an arraylist of messages. Sends a range of messages, prints the arraylist of unsorted messages, sorts messages, and prints sorted list of messages.

      • displayMessageList

        public void displayMessageList()
        Test method that displays an arraylist of messages

      • displayMessageList

        public void displayMessageList(Subject subject)
        Test method that displays an arraylist of messages by subject
        Parameters:
        subject - Subject to display messages by
